CustomField.description: -Ability to plan and prepare the quotation in a timely, accurate and detailed manner based on Client's request. -Ability to gather and source for the relevant and most cost effective solution based on Client's request -Plan and prepare the required resources to ensure that the services are in accordance with the quotation and costing
CustomField.inlineHelpText: -Ability to plan and prepare the quotation in a timely, accurate and detailed manner based on Client's request. -Ability to gather and source for the relevant and most cost effective solution based on Client's request -Plan and prepare the required resources to ensure that the services are in accordance with the quotation and costing
CustomField.label: Quotation & Cost Management
